name: Rhubarb Chutney
recipeIngredient: 2 1/4 pounds rhubarb stalks, trimmed and cut diagonally into 1/2-inch pieces
15 medium radishes, halved and cut across into thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, heat oil over medium heat. Stir in shallots, ginger and curry powder. Cook, stirring, for about 6 minutes, or until shallots are limp.
Stir in sugar, rhubarb and radishes. Cover pot and raise the heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 minutes, or until the rhubarb is tender but not mushy.
